title: Perpetual Dawn 5 - Retro Berlin w/ Dntel, Telefon Tel Aviv, Kid606, & more
desc: Dntel, Telefon Tel Aviv [DJ], M Geddes Gengras [Personable Techno Set], Kid606, Genevieve D [VSSL], Tahl K [Finetime], Z?raya, Eric Parren, Live for Each Moon. Visuals - Alex Pelly Perpetual Dawn is a Berlin inspired late night underground private techno party. It's like a Panorama Dive-Bar. Massive soundsystem. Club Mate. Hefe-Weizen. No Police. No EDM. No Ryanair. Costumes encouraged. Clothing optional. Darkroom TBC. Two Bathrooms. In & out allowed. Dr. Dre: Man whatcha gonna do now? Ice Cube: "What we're gonna do right here is go way back" Dr. Dre: How far you goin back? Ice Cube: "Way back" To celebrate the end of the first year of us throwing parties, the theme for PD5 is Retro Berlin. The city that inspired us to start putting on these afterhours events has much more to it than just the ecstacy and ketamine fueled, Berghain worshipping  easyjetset? techno 2000's. From East to West it is a city of darkness and more darkness, and occasionally a little bit of light, but usually just darkness.  "Sleep when your dead" - Christiane F Outside:? Dntel [Leaving Records] Telefon Tel Aviv [DJ Set]?M Geddes Gengras [Personable Techno Set]?Kid606 [Tigerbeat6] Eric Parren [Le Force Sauvage]?? Mega triple projector live visuals by Alex Pelly ? Inside:? Genevieve D [VSSL] ?Dahlia [Fondue Trax] Z?raya [Phuture Perfect]?Tahl K [Finetime]? Live For Each Moon (Tears of Joy)?
